name: Rockman.EXE Operate Shooting Star
description:
Rockman EXE: Operate Shooting Star (ロックマンエグゼ オペレート シューティングスター) is a RPG video game published by Capcom released on November 12th, 2009 for the DS.
An action RPG where the player manipulates Rockman to explore the "computer world" that spans electronic devices, the first of which is back on the Nintendo DS!
As an original additional element, characters from the "Ryusei no Rockman" series will also appear.
